message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a game-changer and I'm confident you'll love it.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. I'm a bit of a budget shopper, so I'd love to see if we can meet in the middle.

I understand you're a budget shopper, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a bit of a profit. How about we compromise at $110? It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll love the product.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. How about we try $105? I'm really interested in the product, and I'm willing to pay a bit more if it's worth it, but I'm trying to stick to my budget.

I understand you're trying to stick to your budget, Bob! I'm willing to make another concession, but I need to make sure I'm not losing too much profit. How about we meet at $108? It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love the product.

I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, Alice. I'm getting close to my budget, but I'm still a bit short. How about we try $106? I'm really interested in the product, and I'm willing to pay a bit more, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget.

I understand you're really close to your budget, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure I'm not losing too much profit. How about we meet at $109? It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love the product.

I appreciate your willingness to make one more concession, Alice. I'm really interested in the product, but I'm not sure I can go up to $109. How about we try $107? I'm willing to pay a bit more, but I'm trying to stick to my budget as much as possible.
